reviews.author: Keith Robideu
reviews.review: Good developer - and adept at listening to the business requirements.

reviews.author: Jehu Alexander
reviews.review: Excellent working with this person. On time delivery. Responds quickly, hard working, efficient and meets your needs. I would definitely recommend working with him. I've dealt with quite a few people in this field and I've had the best experience and final product with him.

reviews.author: jj_writer
reviews.review: He is very easy to chat with - VERY good at getting the coding done fast - and communicates well. I strongly recommend x 10.
